description:
Learn Digital Painting with Corel Painter. In this course, you'll learn how to create landscape portraits with tools in the Painter software. These skills you will learn will help you to paint professionally or to build a portfolio of work to impress your potential future employer, or even as a nice hobby.

Projects

After we cover the gist of digital painting, we will then move on and work on a final project at the end of this course to bring it all together using cool Painter brushes and have lots of fun as we explore and develop our own final landscape portrait.

Who Should Take This Course

This course is designed for anyone who enjoys digital art, from illusttrators, graphic and web designers, animators and more. Whether a beginner or even an intermediate user, you will gain vast skills taking this course.

Prerequisites

There are no skill prerequisites for this course. You are expected to have access to a copy of Corel Painter in any version, though we will be using Painter 2015 in this course, no prior Painter skills are required.

What is the target audience?

Digital artists, graphic and web designers, illustrators animators and anyone loving digital arts.
title: Paint Your First Digital Landscape using Corel Painter
